Siref noded"Understood."he said while leaving for the thrusters.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> Condor: Condor appeared in brigde and said to Maximal leader "Condor 
reports, sir... What's the situation?" 
> 
> {Talos}
> Bridge
> 
>     Talos looked back over his shoulder from the battered remains of 
the weapons and defense systems computer, his eyes passing over 
Sunhawk who still seemed to want to go to the brig, to the two new 
bots standing on deck. Looking over Condor and Siref. "Stand easy 
Siref, well as you can see we've crashed. I've got some bots..." 
Looking pointedly at Sunhawk, indicating he should get to work on 
helping Hot Rod, "... working on repairs, others are going to go 
through the ship and see who's still functioning."
> 
>     As Sunhawk got to work after discharging himself of weapons he 
answered, "That's why I want sensors up, Maximal command seemed to 
think a group of Predicons were headed back to ancient Earth, I 
suspect that's where we've crashed but I can't be sure, never been to 
the place myself. Once we have external sensors working again we can 
find out if this is the right planet and if so where we've been forced 
to land."
> 
>     Moving to a locker in the floor by one of the chairs he extracts 
a small repair kit and opens the computers panel shifting under the 
console to get at the wiring. "Siref and Condor you two should check 
out the thruster section of the ship, see if anything can be salvaged, 
if anyone needs assistance to the CR chambers on deck two get them 
there first, by all reports the thrusters are just so much slag..." 
Turning back to his work Talos begins rejoining the connections under 
the computer panel using a small hand torch to fuse the bypassed lines 
together to make the connection stable before trying the computer once 
more.
